snippet: On Tuesday, Joel Fowler, who was found guilty of murder in 2009, became the latest person to have a conviction overturned since Kenneth P. Thompson became the borough’s district attorney in 2014.
abstract: Joel Fowler, who was convicted of murder of Duane Smith in 2008, is exonerated in Brooklyn, becoming 14th person to be cleared of charges since Kenneth P Thompson became borough's district attorney in 2014.
lead_paragraph: On Tuesday, Joel Fowler, who was found guilty of murder in 2009, became the latest person to have a conviction overturned since Kenneth P. Thompson became the borough’s district attorney in 2014.

headline.main: Another Exoneration in Brooklyn Brings Total Since Last Year to 14
headline.print_headline: Exoneration in Brooklyn Is 14th of District Attorney’s Term
